snippet: Michael Pena was convicted last week of predatory sexual assault on a teacher, but the jury deadlocked on a rape charge.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on trial of New York City Police Officer Michael Pena, convicted on three counts of predatory sexual assault; asserts that the jury's deadlock on additional rape charges will do little to lighten Pena's load; Pena's sentences on the three felony counts, if run consecutively, mean he could face a minimum sentence of 30 years.
lead_paragraph: Michael Pena was convicted last week of predatory sexual assault on a teacher, but the jury deadlocked on a rape charge.

headline.seo: Juror in Michael Pena Trial Regrets Lack of Rape Conviction
